mongo.migration.extension.name: Azure Cosmos DB Migration for MongoDB

mongo.migration.validation.successful: The connected profile satisfies all prerequisite. Validation successful.
mongo.migration.validationExecution.erro:
Prerequisite check failed unexpectedly.
Please verify connectivity to database and try again. If the issue persists, please contact Microsoft Technical support.
mongo.migration.prerequisite.notmet:
Prerequisite check failed due to privilege issue.
Please validate if the current user has 'readAnyDatabase' and 'clusterMonitor' roles assigned.

mongo.migration.new.assessment.descripti: Conduct a workload assessment and then migrate to Azure Cosmos DB.
mongo.migration.extension.description: The extension helps you run an end-to-end assessment on your mongoDB workload and seamlessly migrate your workload to Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB.
mongo.migration.pre.migrate.cosmos: Pre migration steps to Azure Cosmos DB.
mongo.migration.pre.migrate.cosmos.des: This guide provides you with pre migration steps to perform on MongoDB before migrating to Azure Cosmos DB.
mongo.migration.cosmos.guide: Migration guide: MongoDB to Azure Cosmos DB.
mongo.migration.cosmos.des: Learn how to migrate your MongoDB workloads to Azure Cosmos DB.
mongo.migration.post.migration: Post migration optimization: mongo to Azure Cosmos DB.
mongo.migration.post.migration.des: This guide teaches you optimization techniques post migration to Azure Cosmos DB.

mongo.migration.feedback.text: Contact cdbmigrationsupport@microsoft.com. For a faster response, please provide the issue description, steps to reproduce, and actual vs expected behavior.
mongo.migration.support.note: Note: If you login with your Microsoft account, please select 'General question' in the 'Resource' field. In case you do not have an Azure subscription, contact cdbmigrationsupport@microsoft.com with the issue.
